verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"saba jīva mukti yabe pābe
ei ta' brahmāṇḍa tabe jīva-śūnya habe!"

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord replied; saba jīva—all living entities; mukti—liberation; yabe—when; pābe—will achieve; ei—this; ta'-certainly; brahmāṇḍa—universe; tabe—then; jīva-śūnya—devoid of living entities; habe—will be;
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "If all living entities were liberated, the entire universe would be devoid of living beings."
